TITLE: Trump vows to pull back climate law’s unspent dollars
SUMMARY: The former president also pledged to establish a government efficiency commission floated by Tesla’s Elon Musk, who he suggested could lead the commission.

TITLE: Biden administration weighs price support for US critical minerals amid Chinese pressure
SUMMARY: The effort comes in response to delays and cancellations of many U.S. minerals processing projects.

TITLE: Wealthier homeowners nab billions in tax credits for energy efficiency
SUMMARY: IRS data shows a huge disparity between rich and poor in a major Biden climate effort.

TITLE: UN chief calls rising seas a ‘worldwide catastrophe’
SUMMARY: He sees Pacific paradises as especially vulnerable.

TITLE: Republican fight over green subsidies heads toward a boiling point
SUMMARY: The party's leaders may soon have to decide whether to preserve at least parts of the Democrats' climate law.

TITLE: ‘We don't want to sabotage her’: Why green groups are going easy on Harris
SUMMARY: Environmental groups that put Joe Biden's climate initiatives under a microscope aren't giving the Democratic nominee's positions the same scrutiny.

TITLE: Biden-Harris climate law set off a green bonanza in Walz’s Minnesota
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden’s signing of the Inflation Reduction Act triggered a “race across states” for its hundreds of billions of dollars. And Walz swung into action.

TITLE: The steel plant that saved Vance's family from poverty is getting $500M from Biden. One worker says that ‘doesn't really change anything’
SUMMARY: The Biden administration grant aims to transform the mill from one of the dirtiest in the country to one of the cleanest.

TITLE: Wind developers bid $93M for mid-Atlantic — blowing off Trump 2.0 threat
SUMMARY: The offshore wind industry has struggled, but Wednesday’s auction shows there’s still solid interest from the industry — even with Trump seeking the White House.

TITLE: States scramble to replace gas tax cash
SUMMARY: Thirteen states give drivers an incentive to buy an electric vehicle — before charging them extra for it.

TITLE: Never mind Trump’s new rhetoric — he’s still gunning for EVs
SUMMARY: Trump’s recent change in tone reflects a softening in rhetoric about EVs on the campaign trail.

TITLE: Musk might be the only person Trump listens to on climate
SUMMARY: The billionaire Tesla CEO has Trump’s ear. Here’s what he might tell the former president about rising temperatures, clean energy and making money.

TITLE: This environmental agenda sets Harris apart from Biden — and is bringing attacks from the GOP
SUMMARY: Despite facing some hesitancy among green groups in her home state, the vice president has embraced the cause since her time as San Francisco district attorney.

TITLE: Climate cash pours into election swing region. Will it help Harris?
SUMMARY: An area near Pittsburgh is being recast into a clean energy hub by IRA cash. It’s a test of whether climate policies can help Democrats beat Trump.

TITLE: US oil output notches fresh record in August
SUMMARY: U.S. oil production set an annual record peak in 2023 that is likely to be broken this year.

TITLE: How the landmark climate law hobbled Joe Manchin
SUMMARY: The Inflation Reduction Act is reaping benefits in his home state of West Virginia, but the senator is getting little love for his efforts.

TITLE: ‘No big plan B’: A global anti-Trump climate resistance struggles to gain ground
SUMMARY: Diplomats and activists from around the world are discussing ways to keep up the fight against global warming, even in the face of an absent or hostile U.S. administration.

TITLE: Harris, fracking and Shapiro: Dem campaign looks for Pennsylvania breakthrough
SUMMARY: Vice President Kamala Harris says she no longer wants to ban the drilling that's made Pennsylvania a natural gas powerhouse, but skeptics may need reassuring by the popular governor.

TITLE: Trump vs. Biden’s historic climate agenda
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden may no longer be on the 2024 ballot — but his legacy is. And former President Donald Trump would have multiple tools to thwart his ambitions on energy, infrastructure and climate change.

TITLE: Harris campaign pledges she won't ban fracking
SUMMARY: Kamala Harris' shift on fracking comes after GOP presidential nominee Donald Trump raised her 2019 stance calling for banning the oil and gas drilling technique.

TITLE: Sunday was Earth’s hottest day in all recorded history, climate agency says
SUMMARY: "As the climate keeps warming, we are bound to see new records being broken in future months and years.”

TITLE: House Republicans bail on another spending bill as their summer funding ambitions fizzle
SUMMARY: Anticipating failure, GOP leaders decided to skip a final passage vote Tuesday night of their measure to fund the Department of Energy and federal water infrastructure programs.

TITLE: Congress Trump-proofed this $27B climate program. Here’s why that’s a problem.
SUMMARY: EPA has until September to spend the money. But the agency is short on cash needed to avoid expensive mistakes.
